1.informal: I think that this is interesting.
1.formal: It is my opinion that this is interesting.

2.informal: Please call once you get there.

3.informal: The lawyer I met yesterday was helpful.
3.formal: The lawyer whom I met yesterday was helpful.

7.informal: Can you do all these tasks?
7.formal: Would you be able to accomplish all these tasks?

9.informal: Do you want me to go with you?

10.informal: I can't tell the difference between these two.
10.formal: I find it hard to distinguish between them.

13.informal: We don't think it's a good idea to do anything right now.
13.formal: It is suggested that no action should be taken at this stage.

14.informal: The whole story was made up.

15.formal: I look forward to meeting you tonight.
